"Creatingres" - A Blender add-on that allows users to quickly create animations with simple, intuitive controls.
"Blenderres" - A mobile app that allows users to create and edit animations on-the-go using Blender.
"Blenderbots" - A series of AI-powered bots that can help users automate repetitive tasks in Blender.
"Blenderverse" - A virtual reality platform that allows users to create and explore their own Blender worlds.
"Blenderbuzz" - A social media platform specifically designed for Blender users to connect, share their work, and learn from each other.
